content:
# Example Update

This is a placeholder for demonstration purposes. Real updates will be added by the family when they have news to share.

## What This Section Is For

This Updates & News section will display:

- Advocacy progress and milestones
- Legislative updates  
- Family messages and announcements
- Media coverage highlights

## How It Works

Each update can include:

- A title and publication date
- Category tags (Advocacy, News, Family Updates, Legislation)
- Full article content with images
- Share buttons for social media

Updates will appear in reverse chronological order with the newest first.
